content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Maria. I appreciate your interest in renting it. What rental price are you willing to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I want to pay the lowest price possible, but I am also willing to negotiate. Can you propose a rental price that you think is fair?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Of course, Maria. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 800 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating and would be willing to consider a lower price if you are willing to sign a longer lease agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to sign a longer lease agreement, but I would prefer a rental price of 700 Euros per month. Is that possible?

Mister Heine, I am interested in renting the apartment, but I would like to negotiate the rental price. Can you propose a rental price that you think is fair?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Maria. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would suggest a rental price of 800 Euros per month. However, I am open to negotiating and would be willing to consider a lower price if you are willing to sign a longer lease agreement. What rental price are you willing to pay per month?
name: Heinrich Heine
